Govind Sagar Lake Sir Khad Markanda Rukmni Kund
It is main attraction of the Bilaspur, It is famous for its trout fish and water sports and transportation It is main trubutory of the satluj river, It is life line for many places in Bilaspur as its water has many water supply built on it. It is very religious place. It is present on the shadow of the BandlaDhar and also gets its water form bandla dhar It is sign of sacrifice sign of one sacrifice her life for the betterment of his State

Bilaspur Bandladhar Naina Devi Mata Mandir Govind Sagar Lake
It is distric headquater and situated on the bank of river staluj It is one of the highest peak in Bilaspur. It is famous for its Paragliding activities. It is very auspicious temple for Hindus. It is one of the Saktipith situate in Bilaspur Distric I added to the beauty of the Bilaspur, It is made due to dam on Satluj River called as Bhakra Dam
